de.tud.android.mapbiq.loader
Class WFSTask

java.lang.Object
  de.tud.android.mapbiq.loader.WFSTask

public class WFSTask
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements all 3 specific tasks for creating connection to WFS-Servers. - getCapabilities - getFeature - describeFeatureType Singleton pattern is used.

Author:
nsh

parseCoordinates

public static java.util.ArrayList<Point> parseCoordinates(java.lang.String coord,
                                                          java.lang.String regex,
                                                          boolean polygon)
parse coordinates and return as arraylist of points (de.javagis.jgis.geometry.Point)

Parameters:
String - coord - string with coordinates
String - regex - seperator between two coordinate strings
boolean - polygon - if true, the last coordinate will be ignored (in polygones first = last coordinate)
Returns:
ArrayList - arraylist of point-objects

String - regex - seperator between the coordinate values
Returns:
Point - point-object of the coordinates
